seed_pair.known: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
seed_pair.target: Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.

note: MOLECULAR LEGO FIX: L03+L04 concatenated into 'after you finish' to avoid incomplete 'después de que' construction. Curated to 10 excellent phrases per lesson with strict GATE compliance.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Human-guided molecular LEGO optimization
changes_from_v5: Reduced from 15 to 10 phrases per lesson
Removed GATE violations (saber, mejor, es posible)
Applied FD test principle: 'después de que' incomplete standalone
Optimal distribution: 2 short, 2 quite short, 2 longer, 4 long

S0011L03.molecular_rationale: PHASE 3 FD TEST: 'después de que' alone is grammatically incomplete (requires verb clause). Fails 'Is this ambiguous standalone?' test. Made BIGGER to include 'termines' for functional completeness.
